Protocol Buffers

The Tensorboard interface uses Protocol Buffers. Version 3.0.2 or newer is required. If Protocol Buffers is not detected, it will be downloaded and built locally.

Download

Download the source code from the GitHub repository:

 {.sh}
$ git clone https://github.com/google/protobuf.git
$ cd protobuf
$ git checkout v3.0.2

Installation

 {.sh}
$ cd /path/to/protobuf
$ mkdir install
$ ./autoget.sh
$ ./configure --prefix=/path/to/protobuf/install
$ make
$ make install
